author: Julia Alexander
title: “With me” videos on YouTube are seeing huge spikes in viewership as people stay home
description: What started as a beauty trend in 2010 has grown into one of YouTube’s most popular styles of videos — one that has seen a major growth as people self-isolate and spend more time at home.
content: YouTube creators are performing everyday tasks or taking on crafts and activities that people can do at home because everyone is stuck indoors right now. The genre has boomed as a result of social distancing. Daily views of videos with “#withme” in the title … [+2695 chars]
